title: firefox browser keeps crashing a few minutes while in use.
content:
Hello community, Long time firefox user here, my firefox browser keeps crashing a few minutes while in use. Every time it crashes I need to reset my proxy settings to have internet connection. Safari and chrome has no issues. Problem started when I upgraded my macbook from High sierra to Catalina. I'm running version 87 64bit, I tried downgrading to 82 and worked my way up in different version. Problem persisted, the I tried running Firefox on safe mode and clearing Cache. Problem still persist, I do not know what else to do. Someone please help. I'm running Catalina 10.15.7, I attached a screenshot of my crash reports for some insight.

I appreciate anything anyone can do.

Rudy
creator: staind9491

title: czarny ekran przy filmach dzwięk jest
creator: mikado109

title: Mac Dock Apps are frozen when firfox 88.0 is running
content:
I just updated to Firefox 88.0 on my Macbook Pro running MacOS Big Sur 11.2.3. If I restart my laptop, all my dock apps work as they are supposed to. I can click on any of them and they will open up. If open Firefox, the first 6 dock apps freeze up. I cannot open them from the dock or even drag them off the dock. All other dock apps operate fine from the 7th one on to the right. This is all new as I have used Firefox as my main browser for years. i can use Safari and everything works properly. I prefer Firefox.

Any suggestions or ideas are appreciated. Tom
creator: uncletunes

title: Autoplay block does not work, FF 88.0
content:
FF 88.0.

Tried https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1278114 and it worked but only few minutes. Block video and audio does not work, about:config does not work. I have had plugin FEBE for passwords and worked well. Now it does not work because of new Firefox in 2017. I have found i can export/import through Firefox but one problem: i need go to about:config and add something for import or export. What are programmers doing?? If you don´t know how to program something, don´t do it.
creator: ho.ma

title: Firefox doesn't detect autoplay on some sites
content:
A blog network has managed to avoid autoplay detection using daylimotion... it is really anoying and FF does not allow to add manually a site to the autoplay blocklist

Here is a couple of domains of that network: xataka.com / espinof.com

Example url: https://www.espinof.com/otros/razzies-2021-lista-completa-ganadores-premios-al-peor-cine-ano

Please let me know if is something I can do or I just should wait for a FF update

Regards
creator: depravangel

title: I was downloading the latest version firefox  I need remote help
content: I need remote help. I am stuck in the middle of the download process. I got to the point of changing apps or using the defaults and I'm very nervous that i have caused an issue. I changed the ones I new I wanted to, but there was nowhere to click done, submit, etc. I really need an agent that can come on remotely and see what I have done. I attempted to reach Norton, but I couldn't get through to their AI contact person. I need help immediately.
creator: cheri.adcock

title: cache not clearing
content: Suddenly, cache is not emptying when 'Clear data' is used. Also suddenly, 'Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed' preference is faded out/ unavailable. 'Never remember history' is checked as usual but cache does not clear when Firefox is closed. All cookies and data cleared without problem 2 days ago. This has never happened before.
creator: ssmith205
